summary.para: Localize WPF xaml element by using x:Uid attribute and resource files.
Replace all properties in the UserControl with the texts, that are defined in the Resource by using x:Uid property.

param.name: userControl
param.para: Set the UserControl to localize texts.

param.name: resourceManager
param.para: Set the ResourceManager define the localized texts. If you define <Button x:Uid="formatButton" /> in XAML、then the resource's Name is formatButton.Content.

remarks.para: For example, call the following code after InitializeComponent, in the constructor of .xaml.cs file.
In this version, the following classes and properties are supported.
TexBlock.Text, TextBox.Text, Button.Content, CheckBox.Content, RadioButton.Content, CheckBox.ToolTip, RadioButton.ToolTip.
